SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,B.ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM ,A.VHC_ID ,C.VHC_NO ,D.COMP_NM ,D.AREA ,(IF(B.USE_YN IS NULL, '', IF(B.USE_YN = 'Y', '노선사용', ''))) AS USE_YN FROM BRT_REP_ROUT_VHC_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST C ON A.VHC_ID = C.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST D ON C.COMP_ID = D.COMP_ID
AND A.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT a.REP_ROUT_ID ,b.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_CUR_ALLOC_PL_INFO a LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST b ON a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID

select DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') OCR_DTM ,a.REP_ROUT_ID ,a.REP_ROUT_NM ,a.NODE_ID ,a.VHC_ID ,a.ROUT_NM ,a.VIOLT_TYPE ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.JUDGE ,a.JUDG_ORG ,a.JUDG_TYPE ,a.JUDG_DESC ,a.ROUT_ID ,a.VHC_ID ,a.VHC_NO ,b.NODE_NM from BRT_OPER_VIOLT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST b ON a.NODE_ID = b.NODE_ID
AND a.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y%m%d') OCR_DTM = #{OCR_DTM}
ORDER BY a.OCR_DTM DESC

SELECT NODE_ID, NODE_NM FROM BMS_NODE_MST
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY NODE_ID
